projects.title: HR System
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. I was in charge of architect, design, develop UI, develop backend APIs, model DB, and test code.

projects.title: Twitter Clone
projects.description: Personal project for study Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. User can keep their memories by uploading their comments. :)

projects.title: Werewolf Game Tool
projects.description: Personal project for playing werewolf game online with my friends. This is a realtime web application using Socket.IO. I've learned a lot!
